dataIdInfo.idAbs:
The "Update S3 Bucket" tool syncs local data to the StreamStats AWS S3 Bucket.

This tool can be used to upload data for one or more regions by selecting the proper files for each region.

tool.name: updateS3Bucket

param.name: workspaceID
param.displayname: Select temporary workspace folder for data log
param.dialogReference:
The workspace where the data log will be temporarily downloaded, revised, and uploaded to the S3 bucket.

There is no need to add or edit a log - it will automatically be overwritten by the latest log in the S3 bucket, and will add the data update info to the log and return it to the S3 bucket.

param.name: state_folders
param.dialogReference:
The region folder containing the "archydro" and/or "bc_layers" folders.

The folder name should consist only of a state abbreviation for one of the 50 United States (Ex. NY or TX), the District of Columbia (DC), the Colorado River Basin (CRB), the Deleware River Basin (DRB) or the Rainy River Basin (RRB).

param.name: copy_data_archydro
param.dialogReference: When checked, the region's "archydro" folder will be copied to S3.

param.name: copy_data_bc_layers
param.dialogReference: When checked, the region's "bc_layers" folder will be copied to S3.

param.name: xml_files
param.dialogReference:
The region's".xml" file, whose name should contain "StreamStats" plus the region abbreviation.

Ex. "StreamStatsTX.xml"

param.name: schema_files
param.displayname: Select input schema FGDB or PRJ file
param.dialogReference:
The input schema, in either a .gdb or a .prj file. Generally named using the state abbreviation plus "_ss" and the file extension.

Ex. "NY_ss.gdb"

tool.summary:
The "Update S3 Bucket" tool syncs local data to the StreamStats AWS S3 Bucket.

This tool can be used to upload data for one or more regions by selecting the proper files for each region.
